doc:
Charlie Ruggles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlie_Ruggles 0 Charles Sherman Ruggles (February 8, 1886 – December 23, 1970) was a comic American character actor. In a career spanning six decades, Ruggles appeared in close to 100 feature films, often in mild-mannered and comic roles. He was also the elder brother of director, producer, and silent film actor Wesley Ruggles (1889–1972). Charles_Sherman_Ruggles ( February_8_,_1886 – December_23_,_1970 ) was a_comic_American_character_actor . In a_career spanning six_decades , Ruggles appeared in close to 100_feature_films , often in mild-mannered_and_comic_roles . He was also the_elder_brother of director , producer , and silent_film_actor_Wesley_Ruggles_(_1889 – 1972_) .
